title: Permissionerror [Winerror 5] after Cleaning Temp
body:
Hello,

i am trying to upscale a whole directory. But after the first file and cleaning up temp i get a permission Error.

I used cmd in Admin mode. 

In the end the video gets created, but in avi format. And the temp folders are deleted as they should be. But the it does not continue with the next file.
```
PS C:\Users\Darnas\Desktop\video2x-3.1.0> python video2x.py -m gpu -d waifu2x_ncnn_vulkan -r 2 -i "D:\\JD\\serien\\One Piece\\convert\\" -o "D:\\JD\\serien\\One Piece\\"
```
